dict.acceptation: 意外地，忽然地；奄；勃；霍然；

sent.orig: Suddenly suddenly everything is lost suddenly with everything is found!
sent.trans: 发现了突然一下子拥有却又一下子失去的东西！

sent.orig: She used suddenly toabroad, and suddenly toto Russia, and led an eccentric life in general.
sent.trans: 过去她一忽儿出国远游，一忽儿又回到俄国，总的说，她过着一种古怪反常的生活。

sent.orig: Let person be amazed valiant, true very much suddenly and forcibly, suddenly!
sent.trans: 猛，真的很猛，猛地让人吃惊！

sent.orig: Therefore shall his calamity come suddenly; suddenly shall he be broken without remedy.
sent.trans: 所以灾难必忽然临到他身。他必顷刻败坏无法可治。

sent.orig: The breeze blows suddenly and suddenly, my hear the dint also recover.
sent.trans: 风忽忽的吹，我的耳朵也回来了。
